Warehouse Officer Job at Syntax Technology




        
    

        
        Syntax Technology is a Nigerian-based digital solutions company committed to delivering creative, strategic, and tailored digital services. With a team of skilled professionals, we partner with businesses—big or small—to turn their ideas into results. Whether you're a start-up looking to build your online presence or an established company ready to scale, we offer the digital edge you need.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Warehouse Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee the receipt of shipment parcels from hubs, ensuring accuracy and compliance with company standards.
	Assess waybill shipments received and ensure proper documentation and record-keeping.
	Plan and coordinate the dispatch of waybill shipments to their designated destination.
	Supervise and coordinate the loading process at the loading bay to ensure efficiency and safety.
	Update waybill shipment records in the hub to ensure accurate tracking and accountability.
	Allocate waybill shipments appropriately based on destination and urgency.


Requirements


	HND / BSc in any relevant discipline
	Minimum of One (1) years of working experience in logistics industry.
	Must have completed the NYSC Program.
	Strong analytical, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Detail-oriented with the ability to handle multiple tasks


Salary
N100,000 / month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume to: recruitmentsyntax@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Facility Manager Job at Pentfield




        
    

        
        Pentfield is a brand in the housing sector of Africa's economy, incorporated in Nigeria with the drive to bridging the gap that has been in existence between luxury and affordability. The Pentfield experience offers its clients and stakeholders comfort and value for money through the provision of qualitative structures and aesthetically-finished residences in sync with handing-over process that is seamlessand time-bound.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversees the operation and maintenance of the estate's buildings and facilities.
	Ensure that all properties under management are well-maintained, scheduling and supervising repairs, renovations, and routine maintenance activities.
	Oversee occupant relations, ensuring that lease agreements are adhered to, and handle occupant requests, complaints, and lease renewals.
	Manage the facility's budget, track expenses, and ensure that all services and maintenance activities are performed cost-effectively.
	Ensure that properties comply with local health, safety, and environmental regulations, conducting regular inspections and risk assessments.
	Coordinate with external vendors and contractors for various services, such as cleaning, security, and landscaping, ensuring high-quality performance and contract adherence.
	Carryout other duties as assigned by the management.


Requirements


	Degree or HND in Facility Management or related fields.
	Minimum 5 years of experience as a Facility Manager
	Attention to detail and problem-solving skills
	Proficiency in MS Office tools.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Strong organisational skills with the ability to multi-task
	Well versed in basic technical operations and facility management best practices.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: hr@pentfield.com using "Facility Manager" as the subject of the email.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Yacht Manager (Operations & Marketing)",
  "description": "Grey&#39;s Limited -&nbsp;We are team of professionals with extensive experience in Construction, Interior Design, Architectural Design, 3D Design, Interior Decoration, and Shortlet Businesses, Yacht Business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Yacht Manager (Operations &amp; Marketing)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Yacht Manager to oversee the day-to-day operations, maintenance, and marketing of a luxury yacht.
	This role requires a combination of operational expertise, leadership, and marketing skills to ensure the yacht is impeccably maintained, fully operational, and successfully marketed for private use or charter.


Key Responsibilities
Operational Management:


	Oversee daily yacht operations, including scheduling, itineraries, and onboard logistics.
	Ensure compliance with maritime laws, safety standards, and insurance requirements.
	Monitor operational costs and manage budgets effectively.


Maintenance &amp; Upkeep:


	Schedule and supervise regular maintenance, inspections, and repairs.
	Oversee refits, upgrades, and aesthetic enhancements.
	Ensure the yacht remains in top condition at all times.


Crew &amp; Personnel Management:


	Recruit, train, and manage yacht crew, ensuring high performance and professionalism.
	Handle crew schedules, payroll, and compliance with labor regulations.
	Maintain a positive onboard environment and resolve personnel issues.


Marketing &amp; Charter Management:


	Develop marketing strategies to promote the yacht for charters or private events.
	Manage digital presence, including social media, website, and promotional content.
	Build relationships with charter brokers, agents, and event partners to maximize bookings.


Client Relations:


	Act as the primary point of contact for yacht owners, guests, and charter clients.
	Deliver exceptional guest experiences tailored to client preferences.
	Handle bookings, inquiries, and feedback professionally to maintain client satisfaction.


Financial &amp; Administrative Duties:


	Prepare budgets, forecasts, and financial reports related to yacht operations and marketing.
	Negotiate contracts with vendors, service providers, and charter clients.
	Maintain all necessary legal, safety, and regulatory documentation.


Brand &amp; Image Management:


	Maintain the yacht&rsquo;s luxury brand image, ensuring exclusivity and high standards.
	Plan promotional campaigns and events to enhance visibility and brand awareness.
	Monitor industry trends to keep the yacht competitive and desirable.


Skills:


	Strong knowledge of yacht operations, maintenance, and maritime regulations.
	Proven experience in marketing, client relations, and brand management.
	Excellent leadership, organizational, and communication skills.
	Ability to manage budgets, contracts, and vendor relations efficiently.
	Passion for luxury experiences and attention to detail.


Salary
N150,000 - N350,000 / month.

Yacht Manager (Operations & Marketing) Job at Grey's Limited




        
    

        
        Grey's Limited - We are team of professionals with extensive experience in Construction, Interior Design, Architectural Design, 3D Design, Interior Decoration, and Shortlet Businesses, Yacht Business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Yacht Manager (Operations & Marketing)

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Yacht Manager to oversee the day-to-day operations, maintenance, and marketing of a luxury yacht.
	This role requires a combination of operational expertise, leadership, and marketing skills to ensure the yacht is impeccably maintained, fully operational, and successfully marketed for private use or charter.


Key Responsibilities
Operational Management:


	Oversee daily yacht operations, including scheduling, itineraries, and onboard logistics.
	Ensure compliance with maritime laws, safety standards, and insurance requirements.
	Monitor operational costs and manage budgets effectively.


Maintenance & Upkeep:


	Schedule and supervise regular maintenance, inspections, and repairs.
	Oversee refits, upgrades, and aesthetic enhancements.
	Ensure the yacht remains in top condition at all times.


Crew & Personnel Management:


	Recruit, train, and manage yacht crew, ensuring high performance and professionalism.
	Handle crew schedules, payroll, and compliance with labor regulations.
	Maintain a positive onboard environment and resolve personnel issues.


Marketing & Charter Management:


	Develop marketing strategies to promote the yacht for charters or private events.
	Manage digital presence, including social media, website, and promotional content.
	Build relationships with charter brokers, agents, and event partners to maximize bookings.


Client Relations:


	Act as the primary point of contact for yacht owners, guests, and charter clients.
	Deliver exceptional guest experiences tailored to client preferences.
	Handle bookings, inquiries, and feedback professionally to maintain client satisfaction.


Financial & Administrative Duties:


	Prepare budgets, forecasts, and financial reports related to yacht operations and marketing.
	Negotiate contracts with vendors, service providers, and charter clients.
	Maintain all necessary legal, safety, and regulatory documentation.


Brand & Image Management:


	Maintain the yacht’s luxury brand image, ensuring exclusivity and high standards.
	Plan promotional campaigns and events to enhance visibility and brand awareness.
	Monitor industry trends to keep the yacht competitive and desirable.


Skills:


	Strong knowledge of yacht operations, maintenance, and maritime regulations.
	Proven experience in marketing, client relations, and brand management.
	Excellent leadership, organizational, and communication skills.
	Ability to manage budgets, contracts, and vendor relations efficiently.
	Passion for luxury experiences and attention to detail.


Salary
N150,000 - N350,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info.greysdesignhub@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
